headline: Generally Intelligent (YC S17) Is Hiring Remote Machine Learning Engineers
description:
Generally Intelligent is an AI research company working directly on building human-level general machine intelligence that can learn naturally in the that way humans do. Our mission is to understand the fundamentals of learning and build safe, humane machine intelligence.

Here are our open roles:

ML Research Engineer (SF, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/c2f4a435-1eef-489...

ML Engineer (Remote, Contract or Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/9411e2ec-502a-403...

Research Scientist (SF, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/6c25a25c-35ec-4d7...

Systems Engineer (Remote, Contract or Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/7afede07-8f22-4c4...
